tagline: EOW implementation into a sinatra app
body:
### What's is that?
it's a 'END OF THE WORLD' bootstrap for [sinatra](http://www.sinatrarb.com/) application.

### But Why?
Just for fun, to implements the _http status 799 define by_ [7XX-rfc project](https://github.com/joho/7XX-rfc)

### Okay, how I can use it?
```
gem install sinatra
ruby apps.rb

open http://localhost:4567 for test
```
# it's the 'End Of World' ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Sinatra-eow-bootstrap
